/**
 * Disconnects from your data store.
 * @param next
 */
exports.disconnect = function (next) {
	var self = this,
		toEnd = this.pool || this.connection;
 
	Eif (toEnd) {
		toEnd.end(function () {
			self.pool = self.connection = null;
			next();
		});
	}
	else {
		next();
	}
};
